Making Data Science Accessible to All

Free Training in Coding, Statistics, and Research Methods

Savitribai Ramabai (SARA) Institute of Data Science

Our Mission

SARA makes data science accessible to everyone - not just the privileged few. We provide free training in coding and data analysis to students, researchers, and professionals, removing barriers of cost, complexity, and background. We are empowering the next generation to transform their careers and communities through data.

Support Our Mission

My Page

Training Partnerships

Inclusive Education

Since 2023, we’ve trained 200+ learners from rural communities, public universities, and underrepresented groups across India.


Computer Skills

Learn essential computer skills including operating systems, file management, internet navigation, and productivity software—the foundation for digital literacy and data science learning.

Learn more

Data Science for Social Impact

Learn R, Python, statistics, and Quarto to conduct rigorous research and analysis

R, Statistics, Python, & Quarto

Research Methods for Social Science

Scholars can Learn a systematic approach to investigate, analyse, and interpreting information quantitative and qualitative.

Learn more

English Language

Learning English enhanced global communication, opens doors to diverse cultures, facilitates travel, and provides a competitive edge in the global job market.

Learn more


Data Science Trainings

Week-long Offline Trainings of Data Science.

2nd Summer School “R for Beginners” 25-29 July 2025

I got more hand-on experience during the workshop. Most importantly lost my fear of R.
— Hardik Parmar, MA, TISS-Mumbai

Interactive teaching is what I consider as the main features. I recommend course to others.
— Jatin Mathur, MA Soc., DSE-DU

This summer school has given me the confidence that I can become better with R
— R. Tharun, MA, TISS-Mumbai

I’m from Humanities background & data, programming, & coding seem bit difficult. But SARA made this so comfortable.
— Komal Devi, PhD Scholar, Pol. Sci. JNU

Hands-on training was greatly impactful.
— Dr. Madhu Bala, PhD in Soc., JNU

Its really commendable the way faculty explains each and every step in his classes.
— Md. Allam Ashraf, PhD Scholar, Soc., Jamia University

Know more

Winter School “Statistics using R” 16 - 20 December 2024

This course ensures that we not only understood the theoretical aspects of statistics but also gained practical experience using R, which made the entire learning process much more approachable.
— Sapna Kanwar, MA, JNU

It is a full package that teaches us to integrate three skills: understanding Research Methodology, knowledge of statistics and use of R for data analysis.
— Dharmanshu Dhakar, PhD Scholar, MP

We got to learn about Research Methodology, Statistics and data analysis in R. All the number of lectures and hours sessions are very well designed.
— Mahavir Bhagat, PhD Scholar, JNU

SARA made it possible for students coming from marginalized and under-represented groups in India at such a low cost, with all the necessary arrangements.
— Yashang Jambhulkar, BA, Maharashtra

Know more

Bootcamp “Publish using Quarto” 03 - 07 March 2025

The modules were taught in a simple and informative way.
— Deepak Kumar, MA Psychology, UP

I got to learn great skills in data science which will help me a lot in my academic journey.
— Maga Ram, MA Pol. Sci., JNU

During this bootcamp, I experienced a lot of things about data science. Classes were enjoyable and I had a great experience.
— Rachna Rathi, BA LLB, HR

Making data science accessible to everyone, especially those from non-technical and humnities background is a remarkable and much needed effort.
— Rishav Kumar, MA Pol. Sci., JNU

With the right help, guidance, and support of batch mates everything was made possible. SARA team was helpful and kind.
— Garima, MA Eng. Lit., GVM Sonipat.
